explains: v. 表明，标示；象征，暗示；间接提及，示意；指示，指出；<英>（用灯光或手臂）打行车转向信号；有必要，被建议

sentences.en: The extent of the rise might indicate that it had been overdone.
sentences.cn: 上涨的程度可能显示事情做得过头了。

sentences.en: Early results indicate that the government will be returned to power.
sentences.cn: 早期的结果预示这个政府将重新执政。

sentences.en: The latest polls indicate that the two main parties are neck and neck.
sentences.cn: 最新的民意测验显示两个主要政党势均力敌。
